page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: {Employment }locally: -running and serving in a shop -general repair work -sheet metal business -aluminium works -teaching -gardening { -licencees -fencing and gate-making -undertaking { -farming} For other employment people travel out of the village to Gloucester, Cheltenham,Tewkesbury and surrounding {villages.}Employment includes work as an Antique Dealer, Architect,Banker, Carpenter,Civil Servant,Council Worker,Dentist,Doctor,Domestic, Engineer,Ice-cream factory Worker, Manager,Mechanic,Nurse, Playgroup Leader,Plumber,Secretary,Security Guard,Social Worker & Teacher.
